results.name: Decimal expansion of sum of reciprocals of Bell numbers for n>0.
maple: with(combinat, bell): evalf(sum(1/bell(n), n = 1..infinity), 120); # _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Jan 30 2015
results.author: _Franklin T. Adams-Watters_, Jun 17 2014
